name: CONCLUSE 2 - The Drifting Prefecture
description:
Concluse 2 is an atmospheric horror game which places an emphasis on puzzles, cutscenes, and exploration of a twisted reality. It also features a number of new mechanics not seen in the first game.StoryPlay once again as Michael Benson, a man searching for his missing wife who has been spotted in the strangely named town of Hell. After having made your way through Cordova, you have finally made it to your destination. After 3 years of searching, you're the closest to finding Carolyn that you've ever been. Hell awaits..Features
  • Low resolution graphics keep the game true to its lost ps1 origins.
  • 100+ keys, items, and notes to aid your search.
  • Unique puzzles to uncover hidden secrets and new areas.
  • High quality pre-rendered cutscenes.
  • Voice acted dialogue trees.
  • The introduction of our first person combat system.
  • Much more..
